name: Fast and Furious Max
description:
Hi everyone! My name is Maxwell, I'm 10 years old and I created this car racing game on my name using scratch.

This is a car racing game for 2 players since me and my brothers want to play together.

Compete across 3 races in the Fast and Furious Max series with increasing map difficulty.

Use A, W, S, D to move player 1.

User arrow keys to move player 2.

The player who crosses the finish line first on lap 3 wins the level.

Warning!...bumping the other car or the side of the road makes you slow.

Leave your comments on how I can improve my game. Thank you!

I hope you enjoy the game!
